sense.gloss: starting a business, promotion of enterprise
to get up, to rise, to blaze up (fire)
to wake up, to be awake, to stay awake
to occur (usu. of unfavourable incidents), to happen, to take place
startup, booting up, activation, starting (e.g. engine, computer), launch
raising (a question), posing (a problem), bringing up (an issue), presenting
instituting (a lawsuit), lodging, filing (a claim), submitting (a case)
to raise, to raise up, to set up, to pick up
to wake, to wake up, to waken, to awaken
to cause, to bring about, to lead to, to trigger, to give rise to, to create, to generate (e.g. heat, electricity), to produce
to start, to begin, to launch, to establish, to found, to set up, to open
to plough, to plow, to till
to transcribe, to write down (what is spoken)
rising (from one's bed), getting up, getting out of bed
to cause, to induce, to bring about, to provoke
to pull upright, to help up (e.g. a fallen person)
appointment (to a position, job, etc.), being used for a role, promotion
to be caused by, to result from, to arise from, to stem from, to be due to
dependent arising, doctrine that everything has a cause and there is nothing that arises out of nothing
desperate, frantic, excited, worked up, heated, eager
ups and downs, highs and lows
erection (of the penis), becoming erect, stiffening
rising to action, standing up against, jumping to one's feet
protuberance, projection, prominence, protrusion, bump, boss, process, apophysis
to wake (someone) up (by calling for them), to awaken
to call (to mind), to bring back (memories), to evoke, to arouse (e.g. interest)
being resolved to (do something), having a wholehearted intention
reckoning from some position (e.g. point, date, etc.)
to create (a sensation), to cause (a commotion), to give rise to (controversy)
to raise (a cloud of dust), to kick up (dust)
to rise, to erect, to get up
to dig up, to unearth, to uncover
drawing a card from the draw pile
to stand up, to get up
to start up, to boot up
to take action, to act, to rise (up), to rouse oneself
introduction, development, turn and conclusion (quadripartite structure of certain Chinese poetry)

sdata.j: そんなことは↑起↑↓お↓きないでしょう。
sdata.e: That won't happen.

sdata.j: ↑高校生↑↓こうこうせい↓の↑時↑↓とき↓は↑毎朝↑↓まいあさ↓6↑時↑↓じ↓に↑起↑↓お↓きていた。
sdata.e: Back in high school, I got up at 6 a.m. every morning.

sdata.j: ↑高校↑↓こうこう↓の↑時↑↓とき↓、↑毎朝↑↓まいあさ↓６↑時↑↓じ↓に↑起↑↓お↓きたものだ。
sdata.e: Back in high school, I got up at 6 a.m. every morning.

sdata.j: ↑起↑↓お↓きた↑時↑↓とき↓↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑悲↑↓かな↓しかった。
sdata.e: When I woke up, I was sad.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓には↑何↑↓なに↓が↑起↑↓お↓こるか↑分↑↓わ↓かるんじゃないかと↑思↑↓おも↓うけどね。
sdata.e: You can probably guess what happens though.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なん↓でこんなに↑遅↑↓おそ↓くまで↑起↑↓お↓きてるの？
sdata.e: What keeps you up so late?

sdata.j: 「↑洞穴↑↓ほらあな↓の↑中↑↓なか↓で↑何↑↓なに↓が↑起↑↓お↓こっているんだろう？すごく↑知↑↓し↓りたいなあ」「↑見当↑↓けんとう↓もつかないよ」
sdata.e: What's going on in the cave? I'm curious. "I have no idea."

sdata.j: ↑人生↑↓じんせい↓とは、↑他↑↓た↓の↑予定↑↓よてい↓を↑立↑↓た↓てることに↑忙↑↓いそが↓しくしている↑時↑↓とき↓に↑起↑↓お↓こる↑現象↑↓げんしょう↓のことだ。
sdata.e: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.

sdata.j: はい、それは↑時々↑↓ときどき↓↑起↑↓お↓こります。
sdata.e: Yes, it happens from time to time.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓が↑起↑↓お↓こったの？アパート↑全体↑↓ぜんたい↓↑水浸↑↓みずびた↓しだよ。
sdata.e: What happened? There's water all over the apartment.

sdata.j: ↑朝起↑↓あさお↓きは↑三↑↓さん↓↑文↑↓もん↓の↑徳↑↓とく↓。
sdata.e: The early bird catches the worm.

sdata.j: ↑早起↑↓はやお↓きの↑鳥↑↓とり↓は↑虫↑↓むし↓を↑捕↑↓とら↓える。
sdata.e: The early bird catches the worm.

sdata.j: ↑早起↑↓はやお↓きは↑三↑↓さん↓↑文↑↓もん↓の↑徳↑↓とく↓。
sdata.e: The early bird catches the worm.

sdata.j: ↑朝起↑↓あさお↓きは↑三↑↓さん↓↑文↑↓もん↓の↑得↑↓とく↓。
sdata.e: The early bird catches the worm.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓が↑起↑↓お↓きたのか↑話↑↓はな↓して↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Tell me what happened.

sdata.j: それは↑随分↑↓ずいぶん↓↑昔↑↓むかし↓に↑起↑↓お↓きたことです。
sdata.e: It happened a long time ago.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑遅↑↓おそ↓くまで↑起↑↓お↓きていたにちがいない。
sdata.e: You must have stayed up late.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑戦争↑↓せんそう↓が↑起↑↓お↓こると↑思↑↓おも↓うかね。
sdata.e: Do you believe war will start?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑少↑↓すこ↓し↑早↑↓はや↓く↑起↑↓お↓きなければなりません。
sdata.e: You must get up a little earlier.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はまるで↑何↑↓なに↓も↑起↑↓お↓こらなかったような↑顔↑↓かお↓をしている。
sdata.e: You look as though nothing has happened to you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はハリーを↑起↑↓お↓こすのに↑失敗↑↓しっぱい↓した。
sdata.e: You failed to wake Harry up.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はお↑姉↑↓ねえ↓さんほど↑早↑↓はや↓く↑起↑↓お↓きないんだね。
sdata.e: You don't get up as early as your sister.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はいつも↑何時↑↓いつ↓に↑起床↑↓きしょう↓しますか。
sdata.e: What time do you usually get up?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑振↑↓ふ↓る↑舞↑↓ま↓いは↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑問題↑↓もんだい↓を↑引↑↓ひ↓き↑起↑↓お↓こしている。
sdata.e: Your behavior is creating a lot of problems.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓を↑受↑↓う↓け↑取↑↓と↓る↑前↑↓まえ↓にこの↑事↑↓こと↓は↑起↑↓お↓こった。
sdata.e: This happened prior to receiving your letter.

sdata.j: これはあなたが↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓を↑受↑↓う↓け↑取↑↓と↓る↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑起↑↓お↓こったのです。
sdata.e: This happened prior to receiving your letter.

sdata.j: このことはあなたの↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓を↑受↑↓う↓け↑取↑↓と↓る↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑起↑↓お↓こった。
sdata.e: This happened prior to receiving your letter.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑中↑↓ちゅう↓へ↑入↑↓はい↓ってくるとき↑僕↑↓ぼく↓を↑起↑↓お↓こさないほうがいい。
sdata.e: You had better not wake me up when you come in.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑起↑↓お↓きるころには↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓しているよ。
sdata.e: He will be studying when you get up.

sdata.j: ↑空気↑↓くうき↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓の↑微細↑↓びさい↓な↑粒子↑↓りゅうし↓が↑癌↑↓がん↓を↑引↑↓ひ↓き↑起↑↓お↓こすことがある。
sdata.e: Tiny particles in the air can cause cancer.
